description: AMUNDI ITALY MIB ESG UCITS ETF seeks to replicate as closely as possible the performance of the MIB ESG Index (Net Total Return Index), whether the trend is rising or falling. This ETF enables investors to benefit from an exposure to the 40 leading stocks demonstrating strong Environmental, Social and Governance practices among the 60 most liquid Italian companies listed on Euronext Milan MTA and MIV markets. The fund excludes companies according to the ESG investment approaches most commonly adopted by institutional and private investors, such as norm-based exclusion filters applied in accordance with the UN Global Compact Principles, or those involved in coal, controversial weapons and tobacco. The index is also designed to reduce its weighted carbon intensity compared to its initial investment universe. For further information, please also refer to the fund prospectus or go to Euronext.com.
name: Amundi Italy MIB ESG UCITS ETF DR - EUR (C)
